trans-unit.source: Collect and cache metadata, run hooks on changes.
trans-unit.target: メタデータを収集してキャッシュし、変更に対してフックを実行します。

trans-unit.source: Collect configuration from cloud metadata sources
trans-unit.target: クラウドのメタデータソースから構成を収集

trans-unit.source: It collects data from defined configuration sources and runs a defined hook whenever the metadata has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 定義された設定ソースからデータを収集し、メタデータが変更されるたびに定義されたフックを実行します。

trans-unit.source: Recommend using LibreOffice draw to edit os-collect-config-and-friends.odg and regenerate the svg file. Alternatively edit the svg directly, but remove the .odg file if that is done.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice draw を使って os-collect-config-and-friends.odg を編集し、svg ファイルを再生成することをお勧めします。あるいは、svgを直接編集することもできますが、その場合は.odgファイルを削除してください。

trans-unit.source: Run it on an OpenStack instance with access to ec2 metadata:
trans-unit.target: ec2メタデータにアクセスできるOpenStackインスタンス上で実行します。
チームとリポジトリのタグ

trans-unit.source: That should print out a json representation of the entire ec2 metadata tree.
trans-unit.target: これはec2のメタデータツリー全体のjson表現を出力します。

trans-unit.source: The format of this file is:
trans-unit.target: このファイルの形式は

trans-unit.source: The previous version of the metadata from a source (if available) is present at $FILENAME.last.
trans-unit.target: ソースからのメタデータの前のバージョンが $FILENAME.last に存在しています (利用可能な場合)。

trans-unit.source: These sources will be polled and whenever any of them is changed, default.command will be run. A file will be written to the cache dir, os_config_files.json, which will be a json list of the file paths to the current copy of each metadata source. This list will also be set as a colon separated list in the environment variable OS_CONFIG_FILES for the command that is run. So in the example above, os-refresh-config would be executed with something like this in OS_CONFIG_FILES:
trans-unit.target: These sources will be polled and whenever any of them is changed, default.command will be run. A file will be written to the cache dir, os_config_files.json, which will be a json list of the file paths to the current copy of each metadata source. This list will also be set as a colon separated list in the environment variable OS_CONFIG_FILES for the command that is run. So in the example above, os-refresh-config would be executed with something like this in OS_CONFIG_FILES:

trans-unit.source: When run without a command, the metadata sources are printed as a json document.
trans-unit.target: コマンドなしで実行すると、メタデータソースがjsonドキュメントとして出力されます。

trans-unit.source: You must define what sources to collect configuration data from in /etc/os-collect-config.conf.
trans-unit.target: You must define what sources to collect configuration data from in /etc/os-collect-config.conf.
オーエスコレクトコンフィグ
